title: Auctoria
description:
Auctoria is a real-time online auction platform built to provide users with a dynamic, secure, and engaging auction experience.The platform connects sellers and buyers, enables live bidding, and fosters trust through messaging, reporting, and real-time updates.
It bridges the gap between traditional auction systems and modern online commerce with cutting-edge technologies.
contribution: Led the project team as team leader.
Developed secure login and registration system using JWT and Firebase Authentication.
Implemented product listing with image upload using Multer.
Built real-time bidding and countdown timer with synchronization.
Designed dashboards for user, seller, and admin with role-based access.
Integrated Stripe payment for auction winners.
Implemented wishlist, messaging, notifications, and reporting modules.
Handled responsive design and dark mode for seamless UX.
Implemented account lockout for security against brute-force attacks.
challenges: Setting up JWT-based authentication with secure backend route protection.
Ensuring real-time synchronization of bids across multiple users.
Managing complex role-based UI rendering and data security.
Integrating Stripe checkout securely and smoothly.
Building scalable private messaging under auction contexts.
Optimizing backend queries for search and pagination to prevent slow loading.
Maintaining responsive design across all devices including dark mode.
Handling secure password reset flows and account lockout mechanisms.
